string.value: The latest version is %1. This app is %2.
This app is up to date.
Are you sure you want to delete %1?

Makelangelo %VERSION%

http://www.makelangelo.com/

To get the latest version please visit
https://www.marginallyclever.com/product/makelangelo-software/

Created by Dan Royer.

Additional software and hardware contributions by
Joseph Cottam, Peter Colapietro, Miguel Sánchez
Mark Raynsford, and Kington Chu.

The firmware (code in the brain of your robot) is not the version I expect. I found v%2%. I was expecting v%1%.
Please visit https://www.marginallyclever.com/product/makelangelo-firmware/
for the latest firmware.
Please visit https://www.marginallyclever.com/product/makelangelo-software/ for the latest software.
A friendly name for your robot
Millimeters from center of one motor to the other.
Millimeters from center of motor to bottom of drawing area.
Length of both timing belts added together, in millimeters.
Length of servo extension cable, in millimeters.
Length of cable for each stepper motor, combined, in millimeters.
microsconds (µs). Bigger number means slow down earlier to avoid hiccups and jittery motion.
How fast the servo lifts and lowers the pen, in degrees/second. Too fast and the pen will bounce. Too slow and it will leave a blotch at the ends of each line.
The angle of the servo when the pen is fully raised. Default is 90, perpendicular to the drawing surface.
The angle of the servo when the pen is touching the drawing surface. Default is 30.

May Marginally Clever Robots, Ltd. collect anonymous usage metrics about this app?

You can update this any time in Makelangelo > Preferences > Metrics
Are you sure you want to quit?
Brightness cutoff (0..256). Anything darker will be drawn. Anything lighter will be ignored.
Angle of the lines, in degrees. 0 is horizontal, increasing angle turns counter-clockwise.
How many passes at different cutoff levels? Default is 4.
How many lines to draw on the image
Sandy style begins with rings centered on a point. Where is that point?
Check to convert across the entire paper. Uncheck to stop at the first paper edge.
Check to convert across the entire paper. Uncheck to stop at the first paper edge.
How close together are the pulses?
How much room between one spiral and the next?
Check to convert across the entire paper. Uncheck to stop at the first paper edge.
Angle of the lines, in degrees. 0 is horizontal, increasing angle turns counter-clockwise.
Recursive fractals repeat inside each other. This number controls how many levels 'deep' to go.
Angle of the lines, in degrees. 0 is horizontal, increasing angle turns counter-clockwise.
Space between smallest squares, in millimeters
Seed value controls the start of the random number generator. Save this number to recreate the same tree.
Number of splits at each junction
The variation in the branch angle. 0...100.
Maximum degrees between first and last branch in a node.
Radius (mm) of the inside edge of the spirograph.
Radius (mm) of the outer edge of the spirograph.
More samples for a smoother drawing.
Epitrochoid... won't fit in a tooltip. Look on Wikipedia.
The size of the font, in points. 2.83465 points = 1mm.
horizontal rows inside the maze (between the lines)
vertical columns inside the maze (between the lines)
Back up to last pen down
After changing language the app will need to be restarted to see the effect
Are you sure you want to reset all your preferences?

I consent to sharing anonymous usage data
with Marginally Clever Robots, Limited.
